newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Ngai Lik Industrial sets US$25 mln loan.
newsitem.headline: Ngai Lik Industrial sets US$25 mln loan.

text.p: The following syndicated loan
issue was announced by arranger LTCB Hong Kong.
BORROWER NGAI LIK INDUSTRIAL HOLDINGS LTD
GUARANTORS BY FOUR SUBSIDIARIES: DIN WAI ELECTRONICS CO LTD,
NGAI LIK ELECTRONICS CO LTD, NGAI WAI PLASTIC
MANUFACTURING LTD AND SHING WAI LTD
AMOUNT US$25 MLN TYPE TERM LOAN
MARGIN L+175 MATURITY 3 YRS AVGE LIFE 1.93 YRS
PUTS NONE CALLS NONE LAUNCHED WK OCT 18
DRAWDOWN ONE LUMP SUM AVAIL 3 MTHS HOME CTRY HONG KONG
REPAYMENT NINE QUARTERLY UNEQUAL INSTALMENTS AFTER ONE YEAR'S
GRACE PERIOD
REPLIES 15.NOV.96 (TENTATIVE)
NOTES PROCEEDS WILL BE USED FOR GENERAL WORKING CAPITAL AND
TO FINANCE THE ACQUISITION OF HANGERTON GROUP LTD.
THE FACILITY IS SECURED BY FIVE INDUSTRIAL UNITS IN
HONG KONG AND AN ASSIGNMENT OF PROFIT GUARANTEE FROM
HANGERTON'S VENDORS.
ARRANGER LTCB HONG KONG
MGT LEVELS AND FEES
CO-ARRANGER US$4.0-4.9 MLN 100BP ALL-IN 226.81
LEAD MANAGERS US$3.0-3.9 MLN 90BP ALL-IN 221.63
CO-LEAD MGRS US$2.0-2.9 MLN 80BP ALL-IN 216.45
--Hong Kong Newsroom (852) 2843 6960
